name: River Trap
description:
"love"

In River Trap the river, that flows through your city… there is something mystical and majestic to it. And years after, you can't seem to avoid getting drawn to it. It is as if the river… liked you.

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2004-07-23. The writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The art was done by Kathryn. The engine was created by Jet. Music was composed by Xenorakis. Estimated completion time is 1 hour. Recommended for people 17 years and older, contains mature themes.

River Trap is game Nr. 2 of the Original 22.
